titles.title: Condemning North Korea's February 6, 2016, long-range rocket launch and North Korea's February 9, 2016, restart of a plutonium reactor.
Condemning North Korea's February 6, 2016, long-range rocket launch and North Korea's February 9, 2016, restart of a plutonium reactor.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Asia and the Pacific.

bill.summary: Condems North Korea for: (1) its long-range rocket launch of internationally banned missile technology on February 6, 2016, and (2) its restart of a plutonium reactor on February 9, 2016.
